display_long_description:
Step into the crazy world of I Am Chicken, a fast-paced VR game where you take on the role of a feisty farm chicken determined to protect your precious eggs at all costs. In this immersive farmyard battle, danger lurks around every corner—other rival chickens are after you to stop you, and humans patrol the farm, ready to snatch you away if you’re not careful. With limited time on the clock, your mission is simple: rescue your eggs, fight off enemy chickens, and survive the farmyard mayhem!

🐔 Engage in Chaotic Chicken Combat – Battle against other farm chickens in a hilarious, action-packed fight.

🐔 Beware of Humans – Farmers and workers patrol the farm, ready to capture you. Stay hidden, sneak around, or run for your life when they get too close!

🐔 Upgrade Your Chicken – Strengthen your feathery warrior by unlocking upgrades:

   • Speed Boost – Outrun enemies and humans with increased agility.
   • Power Up perks– Deliver stronger attacks to knock out rival chickens.
   • Health Buff – Increase your endurance and take more hits before getting knocked out.

🐔 Time-Limited Rounds – The clock is ticking! Complete your objectives before time runs out, or risk losing everything.
